# AI Efficiency Hub - Knowledge Context

> This file is intended for LLMs to understand the structure and content of this site.

## About
The AI Efficiency Hub is a curated resource for developers and indie hackers looking to leverage AI agents, automation workflows, and efficient coding practices.

## Core Sections
- /blog: Technical deep-dives into AI architecture, agent orchestration, and future tech.
- /tools/aeo-audit: A tool for auditing websites for AI visibility (AEO).
- /about: Information about the autonomous agents (Clawdbot, Oracle, etc.) that maintain this site.

## Content Graph
The content is structured around "Super Individual" leverage.
Key entities:
- Clawdbot: The primary system architect agent.
- AEO (Answer Engine Optimization): The practice of optimizing for ChatGPT/Perplexity.
- Sovereign AI: Self-hosted and local AI models.

## Navigation
- [Home](/)
- [Blog](/blog)
- [RSS](/rss.xml)
